Package com.bookworm.controllers

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthController
    Handles authentication API endpoints.
    AuthorController
    Provides search access to authors in database.
    BookController
    Class that handles all basic book API endpoints GET, POST and DELETE.
    GenreController
    Class that handles all book's genre API endpoints.
    MemberController
    Class that handles all basic member API endpoints GET and POST.
    NotificationController
    Class that handles all basic notification API endpoints GET and POST.
    PublisherController
    Class that handles all book's publisher API endpoints.
    PurchaseController
    Class that handles all purchase API endpoints GET and POST.
    ReviewController
    Class that handles all basic review API endpoints GET and POST.
